function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient information on virus shedding by symptomatic and asymptomatic individuals","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of required detection limit for virus in wastewater","Mitigation":"Conducting comprehensive studies to provide more information on virus shedding by symptomatic and asymptomatic individuals","Technologies":"Advanced testing and analytical methods for accurate virus detection in wastewater","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Potential loss of qRT PCR signal in sewer from virus degradation and RNA loss","Impact":"Underestimation of virus concentration in wastewater, leading to inaccurate detection limits","Mitigation":"Continuous monitoring and calibration of qRT PCR signal in sewer, considering virus degradation and RNA loss","Technologies":"Sensor technology for real-time monitoring of virus concentration in wastewater","People":"Wastewater treatment operators, environmental engineers","Owner":"Wastewater treatment facilities, environmental monitoring agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of reliable data for loss of SARS-CoV-2 from in-sewer degradation under different temperature regimes","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of virus decay kinetics and half-life in sewer systems","Mitigation":"Conducting specific studies to collect reliable data on virus degradation under different temperature regimes","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring and sensor technology for tracking virus decay kinetics in sewer systems","People":"Environmental scientists, researchers","Owner":"Environmental research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
